page.title: 15HOMELIFE MY SCHOOLDAY
page.content: {Lynn Cairns age 12 I got up at 7.30 a.m. in the morning and got my breakfast which was tea and toast. Then I went outside to the shed to feed my pet guinea-pigs and rabbit. I watched television until 8.30 a.m. then I caught the bus for school. I did Maths and Bible Study, then I went out to play. I bought a packet of crisps at the tuck-shop. After break I did English and Project work until lunch at 12.30. For lunch I had egg and chips and a glass of orange juice. After lunch I played chasing with my friends. In the afternoon I did a note to my penfriend in Sweden. Then I did a book review and after break I went to the gym for games. School shut at 3.45 p.m. and I went home and did my homework and watched television. After supper I went to the swimming pool then went to bed at 9.30 p.m.
